0.text: Innate: Whenever Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he generates 1 − 6 (based on probability).
0.html: Innate: Whenever Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he generates 1 − 6 (based on probability).

0.text: 1 − 6 (based on probability)

1.text: Since his dice are loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining  6.
1.html: Since his dice are loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining 6.
markedPassages: 6

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 1450
Active: Twisted Fate throws a fan of three cards in a cone in the target direction that each deal magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate throws a fan of three cards in a cone in the target direction that each deal magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Enemies can be damaged only once per pass.
1.html: Enemies can be damaged only once per pass.

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 100
Active: Twisted Fate cycles through three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Pick a Card can be recast within the duration, which selects the current card hovered.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate cycles through three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Pick a Card can be recast within the duration, which selects the current card hovered.

1.text:
Recast: Twisted Fate empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal modified magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected, though not being able to  critically strike.
Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
1.html:
Recast: Twisted Fate empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal modified magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected, though not being able to critically strike.
Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: critically strike
cast-inhibiting crowd control

2.html: Blue Card Bonus: Restores  mana.
markedPassages: mana

3.text: Red Card Bonus: Deals magic damage to the target and surrounding enemies,  slowing them for 2.5 seconds.
3.html: Red Card Bonus: Deals magic damage to the target and surrounding enemies, slowing them for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

4.text: Gold Card Bonus:  Stuns the target for a duration.
4.html: Gold Card Bonus: Stuns the target for a duration.
markedPassages: Stuns

0.text: Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed. His basic attacks generate a stack of Stacked Deck, which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
0.html:
Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed. His basic attacks generate a stack of Stacked Deck, which stacks up to 3 times.

At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 5500
Active: Twisted Fate marks all targetable enemy champions,  revealing them for a few seconds. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate marks all targetable enemy champions, revealing them for a few seconds. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration.
markedPassages: revealing

1.text: Recast - Gate: Twisted Fate  channels for 1.5 seconds before  blinking to the target location,  destroying all  projectiles targeting him in the process.
1.html: Recast - Gate: Twisted Fate channels for 1.5 seconds before blinking to the target location, destroying all projectiles targeting him in the process.
markedPassages: channels
blinking
destroying
projectiles
